review:
Dr Jana was there in OT as a child specialist during delivery of my wife - as planned & suggested by our gynaecologist Dr Sanhita Kanungo..
I got to interact with Dr Jana during my baby's first follow up visit at AMRI, Mukundapur. It was a thorough 30 mins of interaction, where he briefed us about each & every basics of parenting/child care.. listened to all our queries  patiently & clarified all doubts of my wife.. A highly experienced doctor who only speaks of all natural methods possible to handle a baby...That's the best part of him....I am very much satisfied & highly recommend Him...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: He is  very nice and friendly.. I am very satisfied with his treatment..he explained basics things to me
********* ******* We visited him for our son who was suffering from Viral fever. His patient hearing and minimal medication did the trick for our kid.

*** ***** **** ** **** *** *** *** He save my 10 days old son from sepsis. which became life threats for my child. I transferred my child from Matri Bhavan Hospital to mukundapur AMRI and immediately he started his medication. His treatment was very unique and he is also a kind hearted person.
